description: The AWS::SecurityHub::ConfigurationPolicy resource represents the Central Configuration Policy in your account.

Tags.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

^[a-zA-Z0-9]{1,128}$.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
^[a-zA-Z0-9]{1,128}$.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption
